trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the name of a key storage provider (KSP) for use with Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.
trans-unit.target: 封裝搭配 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 物件使用的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The CngProvider class is a utility class.
trans-unit.target: CngProvider 類別是一個公用程式類別。

trans-unit.source: It consists of static properties, comparison methods, and a private, internally maintained string that specifies a key storage provider.
trans-unit.target: 靜態屬性、 比較方法和私用，在內部維護的指定金鑰儲存提供者字串而組成。

trans-unit.source: The static properties return CngProvider objects.
trans-unit.target: 靜態屬性傳回 CngProvider 物件。

trans-unit.source: Each object's internal string is initialized to the provider name that corresponds to the name of the static property.
trans-unit.target: 每個物件的內部字串會初始化為提供者名稱對應至靜態屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this class to create objects for provider types that are not covered by the static properties.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個類別來建立未涵蓋的靜態屬性的提供者類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: Several CNG classes (such as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>) accept CngProvider objects through a `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 數個的 CNG 類別 (例如<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>) 接受 CngProvider 物件透過`provider`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: When the class receives the CngProvider object, it retrieves the embedded provider name by calling the object's <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.Provider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當類別收到 CngProvider 物件時，它會藉由呼叫物件的擷取內嵌的提供者名稱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.Provider%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, CngProvider serves as an enumeration of well-known providers.
trans-unit.target: 因此，CngProvider 可做為已知的提供者的列舉。

trans-unit.source: It lets you identify a provider by using a strongly typed value instead of a string.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓您識別提供者，而非字串中使用強型別的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> class internally maintain the provider name specified by the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>類別在內部維護所指定的提供者名稱`provider`參數。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose of this constructor is to provide a method for creating <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> objects for KSPs that are not represented by the static properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的主要目的是類別的要提供任何方法來建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>物件的 Ksp，未表示的靜態屬性<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>類別。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>

trans-unit.source: This capacity enables future [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] releases, service packs, and third-party developers to add new providers, which can be accessed just like the providers that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: 這個功能可讓未來[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]版本、 service pack 及協力廠商開發人員若要加入新的提供者，您可以存取目前可用的提供者一樣。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key storage provider (KSP) to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 將金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 初始化的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The provider parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The provider parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The provider parameter length is 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: provider 參數長度為 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified object to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 比較指定的物件與目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An object to be compared to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要比較目前物件<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: if the obj parameter is a that specifies the same key storage provider(KSP) as the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 參數是指定相同的金鑰儲存 provider(KSP) 與目前的物件; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 比較指定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件與目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An object to be compared to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要比較目前物件<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: if the other parameter specifies the same key storage provider (KSP) as the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 other 參數指定相同的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 與目前的物件; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Generates a hash value for the name of the key storage provider (KSP) that is embedded in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 產生內嵌在目前的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 名稱的雜湊值<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the embedded KSP name.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的 KSP 名稱雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object that specifies the Microsoft Smart Card Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件，指定 Microsoft 智慧卡金鑰儲存提供者。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the Microsoft Smart Card Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Microsoft 智慧卡金鑰儲存提供者的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object that specifies the Microsoft Software Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件，指定 Microsoft 軟體金鑰儲存提供者。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the Microsoft Software Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Microsoft 軟體金鑰儲存提供者的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> objects specify the same key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件指定相同的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies a KSP.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定 KSP。

trans-unit.source: A second object, to be compared to the object that is identified by the `left` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件所識別的第二個物件`left`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two objects represent the same KSP; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個物件都代表相同的 KSP;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> objects do not represent the same key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>物件不代表相同的金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies a KSP.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定 KSP。

trans-unit.source: A second object, to be compared to the object that is identified by the `left` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件所識別的第二個物件`left`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two objects do not represent the same KSP; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個物件不代表相同的 KSP;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key storage provider (KSP) that the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object specifies.
trans-unit.target: 取得金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 的名稱目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>指定物件。

trans-unit.source: The embedded KSP name.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的 KSP 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key storage provider (KSP) that the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref> object specifies.
trans-unit.target: 取得金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 的名稱目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider"></xref>指定物件。

trans-unit.source: The embedded KSP name.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的 KSP 名稱。
